email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Dear Emily,

I hope this message finds you well. We are exploring options for shipping 8500MT of soybean meal from Santos to Rotterdam under CFR terms. We've been advised that your vessel, the MV OCEAN HORIZON, might be available. Could you confirm her current position and expected availability? Also, can you provide the initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for reaching out. Yes, the MV OCEAN HORIZON is currently open in Singapore and could be positioned to Santos for your laycan, ideally starting from October 10. The initial freight quote for the shipment would be USD45.50 per metric tonne. Kindly note that this rate includes fuel but not any potential demurrage charges, should they arise.

Let me know your thoughts or if you need further details!
Cheers,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the immediate response and details. The rate of USD45.50 seems a bit high considering current market fluctuations. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you specify the demurrage rates applicable and the expected loading window in Santos?

Looking forward to your revised offer.
Best, Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the current market conditions, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD44.00 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is set at USD15,000 per day. The loading window in Santos is 48 hours, starting from October 10.

Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.
Cheers,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Final Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We agree to the rate of USD44.00 per metric tonne and the demurrage rate of USD15,000 per day. Could you confirm the laycan dates and the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Looking forward to your confirmation.
Best, Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Final Details
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

I confirm the laycan dates from October 10 to October 15. The MV OCEAN HORIZON has a DWT of 85000 and LOA of 290m. Please let me know if you need any further details or if we can proceed with the booking.

Cheers,
Emily Clark

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Soybean Meal 8500MT - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hello Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez
